history.proof: intros x y H. apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split. - intros z Hz. destruct equivR as [Hrefl Htrans Hsym]. qsimpl time: 1. sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros z Hz. destruct equivR as [Hrefl Htrans Hsym]. qsimpl time: 1.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type R : relation A equivR : equivalence R x, y : A H : R x y z : A Hz : In (equiv_class x) z Hrefl : reflexive R Htrans : transitive R Hsym : symmetric R Unable to unify "In (equiv_class x) z" with "In (equiv_class y) z".
No such bound variable y (no bound variables at all in the expression).
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Type R : relation A equivR : equivalence R x, y : A H : R x y z : A Hz : In (equiv_class y) z Hrefl : reflexive R Htrans : transitive R Hsym : symmetric R Unable to unify "In (equiv_class y) z" with "In (equiv_class x) z".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
R: relation A
equivR: equivalence R

Goal:
forall x y : A, R x y -> equiv_class x = equiv_class y

Premises:
Record equivalence (A : Type) (R : relation A) : Prop := Build_equivalence { equiv_refl : reflexive R; equiv_trans : transitive R; equiv_sym : symmetric R } Arguments equivalence {A}%type_scope Arguments Build_equivalence {A}%type_scope
equiv_class = fun x : A => [y : A | R x y] : A -> Ensemble A
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y \/ R y x -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y \/ R y x -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> P y x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall a a0 : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R a a0 -> P a a0
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> P y x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall a a0 : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R a a0 -> P a a0
antisymmetric = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) => forall x y : A, R x y -> R y x -> x = y : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop Arguments antisymmetric {A}%type_scope
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Inductive clos_refl_sym_trans (A : Type) (R : relation A) : relation A := rst_step : forall x y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y | rst_refl : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x x | rst_sym : forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y x | rst_trans : forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x z Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rst_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rst_refl _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rst_sym _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rst_trans _%type_scope
intro_characteristic_sat : forall (P : ?X -> Prop) (x : ?X), P x -> In (characteristic_function_abstraction P) x where ?X : [A : Type R : relation A equivR : equivalence R |- Type]
Operators_Properties.rt1n_ind_right : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> Prop) (z : A), P z -> (forall x y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n A R y z -> P y -> P x) -> forall x : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n A R x z -> P x
Operators_Properties.clos_refl_trans_ind_right : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> Prop) (z : A), P z -> (forall x y : A, R x y -> P y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P x) -> forall x : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x z -> P x
symmetric = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) => forall x y : A, R x y -> R y x : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop Arguments symmetric {A}%type_scope
transitive = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) => forall x y z : A, R x y -> R y z -> R x z : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop Arguments transitive {A}%type_scope
Setoid.Seq_sym : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y x
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> P x -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x a -> P a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> P x -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x a -> P a
commut = fun (A : Type) (R1 R2 : relation A) => forall x y : A, R1 y x -> forall z : A, R2 z y -> exists2 y' : A, R2 y' x & R1 z y' : forall A : Type, relation A -> relation A -> Prop Arguments commut {A}%type_scope
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Relations.inverse_image_of_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), equivalence (fun x y : A => f x = f y)
inclusion = fun (A : Type) (R1 R2 : relation A) => forall x y : A, R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A : Type, relation A -> relation A -> Prop Arguments inclusion {A}%type_scope
Setoid.Seq_trans : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y z : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y z -> Aeq x z
Operators_Properties.clos_refl_trans_ind_left : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), P x -> (forall y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P y -> R y z -> P z) -> forall z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x z -> P z
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), P x -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a

```coq
intros x y H.
apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split.
- intros z Hz.
  destruct equivR as [Hrefl Htrans Hsym].
  apply Hz.
  apply Htrans with (y := y).
  + apply Hsym. exact H.
  + exact H.
- intros z Hz.
  destruct equivR as [Hrefl Htrans Hsym].
  apply Hz.
  apply Htrans with (y := x).
  + exact H.
  + apply Hsym. exact H.
Qed.
```

original: intros x y H. apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split. - intros z Hz. destruct equivR as [Hrefl Htrans Hsym]. apply Hz. apply Htrans with (y := y). + apply Hsym. apply H. + apply H. - intros z Hz. destruct equivR as [Hrefl Htrans Hsym]. apply Hz. apply Htrans with (y := x). + apply H. + apply Hsym. apply H.
